http.title: Server settings
http.kilovolt-placeholder: Leave empty to disable authentication (not recommended)
http.bind-help: Every application that uses {{APPNAME}} will need to be updated!
http.static-help: Will be served at the following URL: {{url}}

kv-auth-warning.message: You have left the Kilovolt password field empty! This will leave {{APPNAME}} accessible without authentication from any application, including any website you visit!

twitch-settings.title: Twitch configuration
twitch-settings.apiguide-1: You will need to create an application, here's how:
twitch-settings.apiguide-3: Use the following data for the required fields:
twitch-settings.apiguide-4: Once made, create a <1>New Secret</1>, then copy both fields below and save!
twitch-settings.subtitle: Twitch integration with streams including chat bot and API access. If you stream on Twitch, you definitely want this on.
twitch-settings.bot-oauth-note: You can get this by logging in with the bot account and going here: <1>https://twitchapps.com/tmi/</1>
twitch-settings.bot-settings-copy: A bot can interact with chat messages and provide extra events for the platform (chat events, some notifications) but requires access to a Twitch account. You can use your own or make a new one (if enabled on your main account, you can re-use the same email for your second account!)
twitch-settings.bot-chat-history: How many messages to keep in history (0 to disable)

events.loading-data: Querying user data from Twitch APIs…
events.err-no-user: No twitch user is currently associated (and therefore events are disabled!)
events.auth-message: Click the following button to authenticate {{APPNAME}} with your Twitch account:

botcommands.title: Bot commands
botcommands.desc: Define custom chat commands to set up autoresponders, counters, etc.
botcommands.command-acl-help: This specifies the minimum level, eg. if you choose VIPs, moderators and streamer can still use the command

bottimers.title: Bot timers
bottimers.desc: Define reminders such as checking out your social media or ongoing events

auth.title: Authentication required
auth.desc: The installation of {{APPNAME}} you are trying to reach is protected with a password. Please write the password below to access the control panel.
auth.no-pwd-note: If the database has no password (for example, it was recently changed from having one to none), leave the field empty.

alerts.title: Chat alerts
alerts.desc: Send chat messages when your viewers follow, subscribe and other events
alerts.msg-info: If multiple messages are present, one will be picked at random

loyalty-settings.title: Loyalty system configuration
loyalty-settings.subtitle: Loyalty system allowing viewers to accrue points and spend them on rewards and goals
loyalty-settings.currency-name-hint: This will be appended like this: "user has X yourcurrency" so choose a lowercase plural name
loyalty-settings.bonus-points-hint: Extra amount of points awarded to people who have been chatting in the last set interval
loyalty-settings.note: Note: Unlike platform-native systems (eg. Twitch channel points), this relies on chat activity rather than actual viewing status.

loyalty-queue.title: Points and redeems
loyalty-queue.subtitle: User leaderboard and pending reward redeems

debug.dismiss-warning: I am not afraid! ...well ok maybe a little
debug.big-ass-warning: Using this page can severely wreck your database. Please make sure you know what you're doing!
debug.title: Debug ops
debug.dump-all: Dump all KV pairs as JSON

loyalty-rewards.title: Rewards and goals
loyalty-rewards.subtitle: Set up rewards and community goals for your viewers to play with
loyalty-rewards.reward-id-hint: This is what viewers will have to write to claim, ie. "!redeem reward-id-here".
loyalty-rewards.reward-name-hint: This is what viewers will see they claimed ie. "USER has claimed REWARDNAME
loyalty-rewards.reward-details-placeholder: What extra details to ask the viewer for
loyalty-rewards.no-rewards: There are no loyalty rewards, why not start with an Hydrate or Stretch?
loyalty-rewards.goal-id-hint: This is what viewers will have to write to contribute to, ie. "!contribute goal-id-here".
loyalty-rewards.goal-name-hint: This is what viewers will see they contributed to ie. "USER has contributed to GOALNAME"

strimertul.need-help-p1: If you need help, want to report a bug or have suggestions on how to make {{APPNAME}} better, please reach out via any of the following channels:
strimertul.license-notice-strimertul: {{APPNAME}} is licensed under <license>GNU Affero General Public License v3.0</license>
strimertul.credits-renko: Renko, {{APPNAME}}'s mascot and app icon, was drawn by <artist>Sonic_Chan</artist>

onboarding.welcome-p1: It looks like this is the first time you started {{APPNAME}}. You can click the "Get started" button at the bottom to set things up one by one, or just skip everything and configure things manually later.

wip.text: This page is still under construction, apologies for the lackluster view :(
